item.title: base16 - An architecture for building themes
item.description: An architecture for building themes based on carefully chosen syntax highlighting using a base of sixteen colours. Base16 provides a set of guidelines detailing how to style syntax and how to code a builder for compiling base16 schemes and templates.

item.title: Tomorrow Theme Color Palettes
item.description:
“Tomorrow Theme” - a bright theme with pastel colours and sensible syntax highlighting.

A theme should not get in your way but should aid your programming with easily identifiable colours that add meaning and enhance legibility. This was the main focus when developing Tomorrow.

Check out base16 the next evolution of Tomorrow Theme!
